sentence: “If you hit him in the oil and gas sector of his economy, he will fail.” Reps. Josh Gottheimer (D-N.J.) and Brian Fitzpatrick (R-Pa.) have introduced a matching House version of the bill.
title: Bipartisan bill banning Russian oil sets up clash with White House

author: Zachary Evans
title: Manchin, Murkowski Propose Bill to Ban Imports of Russian Oil

sentence: A companion bill was introduced in the House by Reps. Josh Gottheimer (D-N.J.) and Brian Fitzpatrick (R-Pa.).
title: White House, Congress wrestle with U.S. imports of Russian oil
